text: Geoffrey Lees (1 October 1933 â€“ June 2019) was an English professional footballer. He played as a wing half. His father Joe Lees was also a footballer. Lees was born in Rotherham. He played for Barnsley and Bradford City during the 1950s. During his time with Bradford City, he made three appearances in the Football League. After retiring as a player, Lees worked as a youth coach at Barnsley.
